Attributes.description: Use of accounting data in decision making by businesses; financial statement analysis; cash flows; cost behaviour patterns; methods of accounting for costs. (For non-Commerce students only). Not for students with credit for, or exemption from, COMM 294.
Attributes.prereq: Pre-reqs: One of COMM 293, COMM 457, COMR 457.
Attributes.date_buildings: Term: 2, Days: Wed, Start Time: 14:00, End Time: 15:00, Building: Henry, Room: Angus
